title: Budget 2026 : Green energy may get a new boost | Central India Premier English Daily
description: Vivek Shukla New Delhi, Jan 31 (UNI) As Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman prepares to present the union Budget on February 1, 2026, expectations are running high that the government will deliver a decisive push to India’s fast-growing green energy sector.
